data.name: Temple of the Kings
data.desc: You can activate 1 Trap Card the turn it was Set. You can send 1 "Mystical Beast of Serket" in your Monster Zone and this card you control to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 monster from your hand or Deck, or 1 Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck. You can only use each effect of "Temple of the Kings" once per turn.

card_sets.set_name: Duelist Pack: Rivals of the Pharaoh
Premium Gold: Return of the Bling
